name: RADJA
description:
Radja is a Sci-fi, Horror and Mystery Microgame developed by Project J, a group of final year students from National Academy of Art, Culture and Heritage for the Final Year Project of Bachelor Degree of Digital Games Art (2019-2022).

The Radja game is about a group of people being sent by a Non-Government Organisation called MysTech (Malaysia Space Technology) on a mission to find and explore a new planet that is habitable by humankind as the Earth is facing overpopulation. Eventually the mission went sideways as a few months passed since they landed. The mission didn’t go well as they planned as they were under attack by an unknown creature that is lurking around the facility base they’ve set up. MysTech is a leading company known for space exploration, astronomical projects, providing equipment and facilities for space projects. Even a famous leading company have failed along the way but what are the deepest darkest secret that MysTech has buried from everyone?
